attributes.action: Replace parliament with a x factor stile  app
attributes.background: Parliament is broken and sould be replaced with direct democracy

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by an "x factor stile app".

If you would like Parliament replaced with a form of direct democracy, you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/242603

Alternatively you could set out clearly how you would the system to run.
